Container.Name: HandBrake
Container.Description: HandBrake is a tool for converting video from nearly any format to a selection of modern, widely supported codecs.[br][br]Full gui in a RDP container accessible via browser.[br]Use the movies mapping for importing movies to be converted and link to a folder on your unraid box.[br]The /nobody/.config/ghb mapping is for storing settings for handbrake and also contains a watch folder and a sample script for auto-conversion.[br]The output folder is self-explanatory.[br].[br][br][b]To increase screen resolution[br]Toggle advanced in this template and adjust[br]HEIGHT and WIDTH to suit[/b]
Container.Overview: HandBrake is a tool for converting video from nearly any format to a selection of modern, widely supported codecs. Full gui in a RDP container accessible via browser. Also contains the CLI version of handbrake with a script for automation of movie conversions.
